original: Is NOT a member of House $DYNASTY|Y$
translation: 不是该家族的成员

original: Is a member of House $DYNASTY|Y$
translation: 是该家族的成员

original: Realm size less than §Y$VAL$§W
translation: 领地数量少于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Realm size at least §Y$VAL$§W
translation: 领地数量少于 §Y$VAL$§!

original: Søroyar to the west of Ross seems like a good target. It would be a nice addition to our border, plus his maximum numbers of levy is not very impressive. Click on the province.
translation: 罗斯西边的南岛似乎是个不错的目标，可以扩张我们的领土。另外，该地部队人数也不是很多。点击那个省份。

original: Now let's send our chancellor out on a secret mission to fabricate claims. Click the fabricate claims button, then click on Søroyar to place the chancellor there.
translation: 现在，让我们派出我们的外交总管去执行伪造宣称的秘密任务。点击「伪造宣称权」按钮，点击南岛将你的廷臣派遣过去。

original: What instigates a Crusade is that the Pope appoints an area that needs to be conquered in the name of the Catholic church. For him to be able to do that, it must currently be held by Muslims or Pagans. When he does this, a special Crusade war will begin which you are able to join by going to the Pope's diplomatic interactions and choosing 'Offer to Join War'.
translation: 十字军是由教宗以天主教教会之名发起的。他指定一个需要被征服的区域，这块区域必须由穆斯林或原始宗教信徒占据。在他这样做后，会开始一场特殊形式的战争，十字军。你可以在教宗的外交界面点击「提议加入战争」来加入其中。

original: If a Crusade is successful, the ruler who had the biggest impact (highest participation score) on the Catholic side of the war will be considered to have won the Crusade.
translation: 若圣战成功，天主教方贡献最大（最高贡献分）的领主会被认为赢得了圣战。

original: Should you choose to join the Crusade and manage to be the one that wins the Crusade, you will be given all the land held by the enemy in the Crusade area. You will also get piety and prestige, as well as a Crusader trait.
translation: 若你选择参加圣战并并且成为赢得圣战的那个的话，你还会得到虔诚，威望及十字军特质。

original: Should you join the Crusade but one of the other Catholics wins it, you will not get any land but you will still get piety and prestige, as well as the Crusader trait. Click next to end this part.
translation: 若你参加圣战，但其他天主教领主赢了的话，你不会得到领土，不过依然可以获得虔诚、威望及十字军特质。点击继续以结束这一节。

original: Religious vassals of Catholic rulers will only give you troops and money if they have a higher opinion of you than they do of the Pope. The easiest way to assure that, is to actually appoint someone to bishop that already likes you. Click the laws tab to see how you can accomplish that.
translation: 宗教封臣只在相比教宗来说更喜欢你时，才会为你提供军队和金钱。一个比较简单的办法是，任命一个原本就喜欢你的主教。请点击法律按钮，看看如何做到这一点。

original: You can have one plot and one ambition active at any given time. If you already have a plot and want to scheme against another character, you will have to cancel your old plot first.
translation: 同一时间，你只能选择一个野心和一个阴谋，如果你想谋划新的阴谋，就需要取消前一个阴谋。

original: To the left of your portait you can see a small circular button called 'Choose an Ambition'. Here you can set an ambition for your current character. Example ambitions can be to get married, to hoard up a big pile of gold, get a thousand prestige or other things like this. When you succeed with an ambition, you will also get some kind of reward, a better reward for a harder ambition of course.
translation: 在你头像左侧，你可以看到一个标着「选择野心」的小圆按钮。在这里你可以为你现在的角色设定一个野心。举例来说，野心可以是结婚、积累一大笔财富、获得一千点威望等诸如此类的事。当你的一个野心得到满足时，你也会获得某些奖励。当然，野心越难达成，奖励就越丰厚。

original: We talked about ambitions in the intermediary intrigue tutorial. Plots can also be chosen from the character portrait screen by finding a character you wish to plot against and clicking the 'Choose a Plot' button. However, because it's hard to know exactly who you would benefit from plotting against, an easier way is to use the plot selector in the intrigue screen to find interesting plots. It is a large button called 'Click to choose a plot'.
translation: 我们在中级教学中曾讨论过野心。阴谋也是类似的，在你想施加阴谋的目标角色的头像界面点击「选择阴谋」。当然选择哪个角色作为目标才能让你从中受益不是那么容易就能看出来的，在阴谋窗口选择可能在意的阴谋会更容易些。这里有一个大大的「点击选择阴谋」按钮。

original: This part will tell you about ambitions. All playable characters can select an ambition in addition to plotting devious schemes. Click your character portait to learn more.
translation: 这部分将会讨论野心，这是所有可以进行游戏的角色都能够选择的，而不是见不得光的阴谋。点击你的角色头像以了解更多。

original: In the military tab you can see that there are two different kind of levies: Personal levies and vassal levies. Personal levies are the ones you control yourself while the vassal levies are the levies controlled by your vassals and the vassals of your vassals. Click next to continue.
translation: 在军事窗口中，你可以看到两种不同的征召兵：你的私人征召兵和你的封臣的征召兵。私人征召兵是你自己控制的。封臣征召兵则包括你的封臣和你的封臣的封臣的征召兵。请点击继续。

original: Because you are playing as a Catholic ruler, provinces owned by religious holders like bishops will only give you money if their opinions of you are higher than their opinion of the Pope. Otherwise the money goes to him. Vassals other than bishops will always give you money, but you will get more if they like you.
translation: 因为你是扮演一位天主教统治者，宗教领主（例如主教)如果对你的好感度比对教宗更高，那么他们所控制的省份将会向你上缴贡金。否则，他们会向教宗上缴贡金。非宗教封臣一直会向你缴纳贡金。不过如果他们对你好感度高就会缴纳更多贡金。

original: Adult §Y$DYNASTY$§! men at court: §Y$NUM$§! (§Y$GOLD$§!¤ each).
translation: §Y$DYNASTY$§!成年男性廷臣：§Y$NUM$§!（每人 §Y$GOLD$§!¤）。

original: Adult male courtiers of the Patrician's dynasty all require a share of the income. In return, they increase the Trade Post limit.
translation: 所有该贵人家族的男性廷臣都要求获得一份收入。作为回报，他们会增加贸易站上限。

original: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to seize control of the coastal §Y$TITLE$§! since he or a vassal Patrician has a Trade Post in place, or the target is a rival merchant republic.
translation: 因为他或他的封臣贵人在该地有一个贸易站，又或者因为目标为敌对商业共和国，§Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以宣战来夺取位于海岸的§Y$TITLE$§!。

original: As a Merchant Republic, §Y$CLAIMANT$§! can declare war to seize control of §Y$TITLE$§! since they already control a city there and the county is within range.
translation: 作为一个商业共和国，§Y$CLAIMANT$§!可以宣战以获取§Y$TITLE$§!。因为他们已控制了那里的一座城市而且该伯爵也在其进攻范围之内。

original: Trade Post Limit: §Y$LIMIT$§!
translation: 贸易站上限：§Y$LIMIT$§!

original: Minimum Trade Post Limit: §Y$NUM$§!
translation: 贸易站下限：§Y$NUM$§!

original: Adult Male Family Members in Court: §Y+$VALUE$§!
translation: 宫廷中的同一家族成年男性：§Y+$VALUE$§!

original: Breaking the Truce (ends on §Y$DATE$§!) would cost you §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige. You would be considered a '§YTruce Breaker§!', lowering all §Y[Recipient.Religion.GetGroupName]§! rulers' opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!.
translation: 打破和约（将在§Y$DATE$§!结束）会消耗你§R$PRESTIGE$§!威望。你会被认为是一个「§Y不遵守和约的人§!」，降低所有§Y[Recipient.Religion.GetGroupName]§!统治者对你的好感§R$OPINION$§!。

original: Using this option is viewed as tyrannical, and will lower the opinions of all characters in the Republic of you by §R$OPINION$§!
translation: 按下这个按钮后你就会被视为暴君，并且共和国内的所有角色都会对你的好感度下降§R$OPINION$§!。

original: Propose that §Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W get married. As the relative of a $MYPARTYTIER$, §Y$MYPARTY$§W would gain $PRESTIGE$ prestige from marrying into §YHouse [RecipientExtra.GetOnlyDynastyName]§W and $PRESTIGE2$ from marrying the relative of a $THEIRPARTYTIER$.
translation: 提议让§Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!结婚。作为一位$MYPARTYTIER$的亲属，§Y$MYPARTY$§!将会因为与§Y[RecipientExtra.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!家族的成员结婚而获得 $PRESTIGE$ 威望值，又因为与一位$THEIRPARTYTIER$的亲属结婚，获得 $PRESTIGE2$ 威望值。

original: Propose that §Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W get married. translation: 提议让§Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!订婚。作为一位$MYPARTYTIER$的亲属，§Y$MYPARTY$§!将会因为与§Y[RecipientExtra.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!家族的成员结婚而获得 $PRESTIGE$ 威望值，又因为与一位$THEIRPARTYTIER$的亲属结婚，获得 $PRESTIGE2$ 威望值。

original: Propose that §Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W and §Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W get betrothed. As the relative of a $MYPARTYTIER$, §Y$MYPARTY$§W and you would gain $PRESTIGE$ prestige from marrying into §YHouse [RecipientExtra.GetOnlyDynastyName]§W and $PRESTIGE2$ from marrying the relative of a $THEIRPARTYTIER$.
translation: 提议让§Y[ActorExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!订婚。作为一位$MYPARTYTIER$的亲属，§Y$MYPARTY$§!和你将会因为与§Y[RecipientExtra.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!家族的成员结婚而获得 $PRESTIGE$ 威望值，又因为与一位$THEIRPARTYTIER$的亲属结婚，获得 $PRESTIGE2$ 威望值。
